info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cass, southeastern Schuyler, southwestern Mason and north central Morgan Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 829 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beardstown, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bluff Springs around 845 AM CDT. Arenzville around 855 AM CDT. Virginia around 905 AM CDT. Literberry around 915 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Concord, Frederick, Philadelphia and Jacksonville Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
